tos-acceptance: By placing an order, you agree to %s1 and also agree to %s2.
paymentsuccess-title: Congratulations, the payment for your trip has been validated.
paymentsuccess-subtitle: Now, our team takes care of the rest of your trip. Stay tuned in the Notifications tab of the future actions necessary to finalize the steps. Keep following the final progress in the dashboard, there are only a few steps left before everything is finished !
paymentsuccess-footer: Informations are stored on our side for easier access to your trip !
